verses.roman:
purīra āvaraṇa-rūpe purīra nava-deśe
nava-vyūha-rūpe nava-mūrti parakāśe

synonyms: purīra—of Dvārakā Purī; āvaraṇa-rūpe—as a covering for the four sides; purīra nava-deśe—in nine different parts of the city; nava-vyūha-rūpe—in nine Deities; nava-mūrti—nine forms; parakāśe—manifests.
translation: "Lord Kṛṣṇa personally surrounds Dvārakā Purī as its protector. In different parts of the Purī, in nine places, He expands in nine different forms.
